original_text: So those who were about to examine him withdrew from him immediately, and the tribune also was afraid, for he realized that Paul was a Roman citizen and that he had bound him.
korean_text: 심문하려던 사람들이 곧 그에게서 물러가고 천부장도 그가 로마 시민인 줄 알고 또 그 결박한 것 때문에 두려워하니라

sentences.original_text: So those who were about to examine him
and the tribune also was afraid
for he realized that Paul was a Roman citizen
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 바울이 로마 시민임을 깨달았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and that he had bound him
